articles.author: Arslan Ali
articles.title: Natural Gas and Oil Forecast: Brent Stabilizes at $82.40, More Gains Ahead? - FX Empire
articles.description: With Brent crude steady at $82.40, analysts predict possible upward momentum driven by improved market fundamentals and easing geopolitical tensions.
articles.content:
Brent Price Chart
Brent crude oil (UKOIL) is trading at $82.40, reflecting a slight increase of 0.18%. On the 2-hourly chart, the pivot point is set at $82.56. Immediate resistance levels are at $83… [+483 chars]
